sentence: Karine Jean-Pierre (@K_JeanPierre) March 12, 2019 Reminder: Brian Kemp stole the gubernatorial election from Georgians and Stacey Abrams.https://t.co/ZIKGTd6U1v Karine Jean-Pierre (@K_JeanPierre) April 2, 2020 The Biden administration has targeted disinformation? about elections, to the point of appointing a Disinformation Governance Board? within the Department of Homeland Security, headed by Nina Jankowicz, who also spread false conspiracy theories about the 2016 election, and who denied the reality of Hunter Biden's laptop in the 2020 election.
author: Joel B. Pollak
title: Incoming White House Press Secretary Karine Jean-Pierre Has History of Disinformation About Elections
